title: Spooked by AI, Bollywood stars drag Google into fight for 'personality rights'
description: NEW DELHI (Reuters) -In India, Bollywood stars are asking judges to protect their voice and persona in the era of artificial intelligence. One famous couple's biggest target is Google's video arm YouTube.

title: ‘AI actor’ Tilly Norwood stirs outrage in Hollywood
description: Like thousands of actors, Tilly Norwood is looking for a Hollywood agent. But unlike most young performers aspiring to make it in the film industry, Tilly Norwood is an entirely artificial intelligence-made character.
content:

title: Velantra AI Shares What Investors Should Ask Before Choosing an AI Trading System
description: Artificial intelligence is moving quickly from theory to practice in financial markets. Trading platforms now claim to analyze thousands of data points, rotate strategies in real time, and adjust to market conditions in ways that traditional systems cannot. With so many choices, however, investors face an important challenge: separating marketing claims from systems designed with […]

title: NDMC school students learn AI, VR and generative tools
description: Around 300 NDMC school students have been trained in artificial intelligence tools, storytelling and visuals during a three-day workshop. The initiative, aimed at Classes 9 to 12, introduced AI, machine learning and virtual reality, preparing students for future careers.
content:
Around 300 students from schools run by the New Delhi Municipal Council were introduced to the world of artificial intelligence during a special three-day workshop titled Aces of AI.
The programme, which concluded on Monday, was designed to help youn... [2055 chars]

title: The Hartford Opens Technology Center In Hyderabad To Accelerate AI Innovation
description: Hyderabad (Telangana) [India], October 1: The Hartford, a leading U.S.-based insurance company, announces the grand opening of its new India Technology Center today in Hyderabad's Financial District. This strategic expansion reinforces the company's commitment to advancing artificial intelligence and digital innovation.

title: OpenAI launches new social app Sora, lets you add friends to videos using AI
description: OpenAI has announced the launch of its new social video app Sora, which brings artificial intelligence-powered video creation directly to users. The app, currently limited to iPhones in the US and Canada, works on an invite-only basis.
